analysis.description:
ElpisCrowdsale.withdraw (/unique_chucks/19/0xc8cfb651c10b5cb7d08694b41f9fa2c06668e2b1.sol#434-457) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.transfer(msg.sender,elpBalance) (/unique_chucks/19/0xc8cfb651c10b5cb7d08694b41f9fa2c06668e2b1.sol#442-443)
	-token.transfer(msg.sender,elpBalance.mul(threshold).div(ethBalance)) (/unique_chucks/19/0xc8cfb651c10b5cb7d08694b41f9fa2c06668e2b1.sol#449-450)

ElpisCrowdsale.claimTokens (/unique_chucks/19/0xc8cfb651c10b5cb7d08694b41f9fa2c06668e2b1.sol#468-477) does not use the value returned by external calls:
